name: Franklin Associates Ltd. (2001) Franklin USA 98
description: Franklin Associates provided datasets for several materials to be used in the SimaProLCA software. The cradle-to-gate data sets developed by Franklin Associates in 1998 were also used initially in the U.S. LCI database and include materials such as various plastic resins, metals, glass, paper and paperboard. Additionally, Franklin Associates provided SimaPro with datasets for fuels and electricity. SimaPro software, published by PRÃ© Consultants, continues to be the main LCA software used by Franklin Associates.
textReference: Franklin USA 98 Library: Inv. data for North American materials, energy and transport
